spanish: Puedes ocupar tu tiempo de la manera que tú quieras; es tu tiempo al fin y al cabo.
finnish: Voit käyttää aikasi millä tapaa haluat; sehän on sinun aikaasi loppujen lopuksi.
english: You can spend your time in any way you want; it's your time, after all.
Please deal the cards.

spanish: No soy lo suficientemente fuerte para hacer esto.
finnish: En ole tarpeeksi vahva tekemään tätä.
english: I'm not strong enough to do this.
I want to live in Brazil.

spanish: Tom dijo que quisiera otra taza de café.
finnish: Tom sanoi, että hän haluaisi toisen kupillisen kahvia.
english: Tom said he'd like to have another cup of coffee.

spanish: ¿Me podría dar un mapa del metro, por favor?
english: Please could I have a subway map.

spanish: Quiero saber acerca del nuevo trabajo de Tom.
finnish: Haluan saada tietää Tomin uudesta työstä.
english: I want to know about Tom's new job.

spanish: Por favor, compórtese como un caballero inglés.
finnish: Käyttäydythän sitten niin kuin englantilainen herrasmies.
english: Please behave like an English gentleman.
Can you stop calling me that?

spanish: No puedo, a pesar que quiero.
english: I can't even if I want to.
Why would anyone want to do that?

spanish: No quiero que esto suceda otra vez.
english: I don't want this to happen again.
I want a puppy.

spanish: Quisiera ver los árboles de donde agarraste estas manzanas.
finnish: Haluaisin nähdä puut, joista poimit nämä omenat.
english: I would like to see the trees from which you picked these apples.

spanish: ¿Puedes asegurarte de que Tom aparezca a tiempo?
finnish: Voitko varmistaa, että Tom ilmestyy paikalle ajoissa?
english: Could you make sure Tom shows up on time?

spanish: No voy a alcanzar a hacerlo.
english: I'm not going to make it on time.

spanish: Quisiera ir a ver una película.
english: I'd like to go see a movie.

spanish: Quiero que seas mi amiga de nuevo.
english: I want you to be my friend again.

spanish: El diablo nos enseña a hacer sus trucos, pero no a ocultarlos.
finnish: Piru opettaa meille temppujaan mutta ei kuinka peittää niitä.
english: The devil teaches us his tricks but not how to hide them.
You need money to make money.
I want to buy pineapples.
I don't want the ring.

spanish: Desafortunadamente, no puedo hacer eso por ti.
finnish: Valitettavasti en voi tehdä sitä puolestasi.
english: Unfortunately, I can't do that for you.

spanish: Solo quiero ser una persona normal.
english: I just want to be a normal person.

spanish: Tom estaba a punto de hacer la llamada telefónica más importante de su vida.
finnish: Tom oli juuri aikeissa soittaa elämänsä tärkeimmän puhelun.
english: Tom was about to make the most important phone call of his life.

spanish: Tom no tenía derecho a hacer lo que hizo.
finnish: Tomilla ei ollut oikeutta tehdä mitä teki.
english: Tom had no right to do what he did.
Can you find it?

spanish: No necesito vigilar a Tom todo el tiempo.
finnish: Minun ei tarvitse vahtia Tomia koko ajan.
english: I don't need to watch Tom all the time.
I want to go out with him.

spanish: Tom estaba apresurado así que dejó su cama sin hacer.
finnish: Tomilla oli kiire, niinpä hän jätti vuoteensa tekemättä.
english: Tom was in a hurry so he left his bed unmade.

spanish: Estoy cansada y me quiero ir a la cama.
finnish: Olen väsynyt ja haluan mennä nukkumaan.
english: I'm tired and I want to go to bed.

spanish: El amor es lo que verdaderamente no quiero perder.
finnish: Rakkaus on se, mitä en todellakaan halua menettää.
english: Love is what I really don't want to lose.
You can't stop progress.

spanish: Haz lo que digo y nadie saldrá herido.
finnish: Tee niin kuin sanon, niin keneenkään ei satu.
english: Do as I say, and no one will get hurt.

spanish: Tom me rogó que le ayudara a hacerlo.
finnish: Tom kerjäsi minua auttamaan häntä tekemään se.
english: Tom begged me to help him do it.

spanish: Quisiera comprar un computador nuevo para mí; muéstrame el mejor modelo.
finnish: Haluaisin ostaa uuden tietokoneen itselleni; näytä minulle paras malli.
english: I would like to buy myself a new computer; show me the best model.

spanish: No estoy segura de si quiero tocar eso.
finnish: En ole varma haluanko koskea tuota.
english: I'm not sure I want to touch that.

spanish: Solo quiero contarle a Tom antes de que otro le cuente.
finnish: Haluan vain kertoa Tomille ennen kuin joku muu kertoo.
english: I just want to tell Tom before somebody else does.

spanish: Quiero que me escuches con mucho cuidado.
finnish: Haluan että kuuntelet minut todella tarkkaan.
english: I want you to listen to me very carefully.

spanish: Quiero saber qué le pasó a tu auto.
english: I want to know what happened to your car.

spanish: No tuve más opción que hacer lo que Tom me decía que haga.
finnish: Minulla ei ollut muuta vaihtoehtoa kuin tehdä, mitä Tom käski minun tehdä.
english: I had no choice but to do what Tom told me to do.

spanish: No puedes culpar a Tom por toda tu mala suerte.
finnish: Emme voi syyttää kaikkesta huonosta onneasi Tomia.
english: You can't blame all your bad luck on Tom.

spanish: Quisiera que Tom me llevara a casa.
english: I'd like Tom to take me home.

spanish: No quiero hacer esto, pero no me dejas más alternativa.
finnish: En halua tehdä tätä, mutta et jätä minulle muuta mahdollisuutta.
english: I don't want to do this, but you leave me no choice.
I could do this for days.
Who else would you like to blame?
That's what you want to do, isn't it?

spanish: No quiero a Tom en este edificio.
english: I don't want Tom in this building.
I want to talk with you about Tom.

spanish: Quiero hablar con Tom acerca de María.
english: I want to talk to Tom about Mary.

spanish: Tom, no quiero que te lastimes.
finnish: Tom, en halua että sinuun sattuu.
english: Tom, I don't want you getting hurt.

spanish: No quiero que Tom oiga de esto.
english: I don't want Tom to hear about this.

spanish: ¿Puedes nombrar todos los árboles en el jardín?
english: Can you name all the trees in the garden?

spanish: No quiero hacerlo porque es peligroso y tonto.
finnish: En halua tehdä sitä, koska se on vaarallista ja typerää.
english: I don't want to do it because it's dangerous and it's stupid.

spanish: Todos cometen estupideces así en la escuela.
english: Everybody does stupid stuff like that in high school.

spanish: La falta de sueño lo lleva a uno a hacer estupideces.
english: Lack of sleep will make you do stupid things.

spanish: Incluso la gente inteligente hace estupideces de vez en cuando.
finnish: Jopa viisaat ihmiset tekevät silloin tällöin typeryyksiä.
english: Even smart people sometimes do stupid things.

spanish: La gente hace estupideces cuando está enojada.
finnish: Ihmiset tekevät typeryyksiä, kun he ovat vihaisia.
english: People do stupid things when they're angry.

spanish: Fue estúpido. Jamás debimos hacer eso.
finnish: Se oli typerää. Meidän ei olisi ikinä pitänyt tehdä sitä.
english: It was stupid. We never should've done it.

spanish: El hambre puede llevar a la gente a hacer estupideces.
finnish: Nälkä voi panna ihmiset tekemään typeryyksiä.
english: Hunger can make people do stupid things.

spanish: ¿Quién sería tan estúpido como para hacer eso?
finnish: Kuka olisi niin typerä, että tekisi noin?
english: Who would be stupid enough to do that?
Children do a lot of stupid things.

spanish: Hacerse un tatuaje es una idea tonta.
english: Getting a tattoo is a stupid idea.
Who would do such a stupid thing?

spanish: Los niños a menudo hacen estupideces.
english: Children often do stupid things.

spanish: Puedes creer todo lo que quieras de mí, pero eso no significa que sea cierto.
finnish: Voit uskoa minusta mitä haluat, mutta se ei tarkoita, että se olisi totta.
english: You can believe what you want to about me, but that doesn't mean it's true.

spanish: Lávate las manos después de ir al baño, por favor.
english: Please wash your hands after using the bathroom.

spanish: Uno de nosotros dos debe hacerlo.
finnish: Toisen meistä kahdesta on tehtävä se.
english: One of us two should do it.

spanish: Ahora tengo que hacer otra cosa.
finnish: Minun täytyy tehdä nyt jotain muuta.
english: I have to do something else now.

spanish: Podrías haberme hablado de esto antes.
finnish: Olisit voinut kertoa tästä minulle aikaisemmin.
english: You could've told me about this earlier.
I don't even want to know.

spanish: Debes hacerlo, te guste o no.
finnish: Tykkäät siitä tai et, sinun täytyy tehdä se.
english: You must do it, like it or not.
You can't fool me.

spanish: Quiero que Tom gane las elecciones.
english: I want Tom to win the election.
I want pizza!

spanish: Estoy haciendo lo que debo hacer.
english: I'm doing what I have to do.
Can you call me later?
You are the very person I need.
You couldn't be more wrong.
You couldn't be more wrong.
Can you save a seat for me?

spanish: Necesito una caja más o menos de este porte.
english: I need a box about this big.

spanish: A Tom le costaba hacer amigos.
english: Tom had trouble making friends.

spanish: No te puedes imaginar lo humillante que es esto.
finnish: Et voi kuvitella kuinka nöyryyttävää tämä on.
english: You can't imagine how humiliating this is.
I would like to live in France.
I'll call you if I need you.
I need a long nap.

spanish: Por eso quiero hablar con Tom.
finnish: Sen takia haluan puhua Tomin kanssa.
english: That's why I want to talk to Tom.
Can you stop yelling?
Do I have to do it already?

finnish: Täytyykö minun tehdä se nyt heti?
english: Do I have to do it right now?

finnish: Täytyykö minun tehdä se nyt heti?
english: Do I have to do it now?

spanish: No puedes hacer buena sopa con carne barata.
finnish: Hyvää keittoa ei voi saa halvalla lihalla.
english: You can't make good soup with cheap meat.
I want to be more independent.

spanish: La astuta serpiente le dijo al bobo unicornio qué hacer.
finnish: Viisas käärme kertoi höpsölle yksisarviselle mitä tehdä.
english: The sagacious serpent told the silly unicorn what to do.
I want to come in.

spanish: No me quiero casar, pero quiero tener hijos.
finnish: En halua mennä naimisiin, mutta haluan lapsia.
english: I don't want to get married, but I want to have kids.
Wait for Mary.
You know what I need.
You can be sure of that.
You can be sure of that.
I want to go to the mountain.
I can do it now.

spanish: Quisiera que pararas de hacer eso.
english: I wish you'd quit doing that.
Why do I need a lawyer?
I don't need protection.
I want a knife.

spanish: Apuesto a que no puedes hacer esto.
finnish: Lyön vetoa, että et osaa tehdä tätä.
english: I bet you can't do this.
I need some volunteers.
What would you do without us?
What would you do without us?
Do it with me.

spanish: Quiero hacerte unas preguntas con respecto a Tom.
english: I want to ask you about Tom.

spanish: Quiero jugar tenis contigo algún día.
english: I want to play tennis with you someday.
I need advice.
I don't want to kill you, Tom.
Give me the car keys.
I want to make Tom jealous.

spanish: Necesito ayuda para traducir este documento al francés.
finnish: Tarvitsen apua tämän dokumentin kääntämisessä ranskaksi.
english: I need help translating this document into French.

spanish: No hay para qué hacer esto.
english: We don't have to do this.
We have work to do.
I don't want to dance.

spanish: Tom tuvo que hacer un desvío.
english: Tom had to take a detour.

spanish: Hoy no quiero ir a trabajar.
english: I don't want to go to work today.
I want to eat ice cream.
I need it as soon as possible.

spanish: Me gustaría quedarme y charlar, pero tengo que irme a una reunión.
finnish: Haluaisin jäädä juttelemaan, mutta minun pitää mennä tapaamiseen.
english: I'd like to stay and chat, but I've got a meeting to go to.

spanish: Quería ayudar, pero no podía hacer nada.
finnish: Halusin auttaa, mutta en pystynyt tehdä mitään.
english: I wanted to help, but I couldn't do anything.
I'd like to live in Australia.

spanish: Yo sólo quiero ayudar a Tom.
english: I just want to help Tom.
I just want to help Tom.

finnish: En saa unta tuon melun takia.
english: That noise keeps me from sleeping.
Make me happy.

spanish: Quiero conocer qué es el amor.
english: I want to know what love is.

spanish: Alguien debería hacer una película de esto.
english: Somebody should make a movie out of this.

spanish: Tengo que hacer unas cuantas cosas.
english: I have a few things I need to do.
I like tomato soup.
Can you dance?
Can you come, too?
Can you sign this?
I don't want to kill anybody.

spanish: No sabía qué hacer en esa situación.
finnish: En tiennyt, mitä tehdä siinä tilanteessa.
english: I didn't know how to deal with that situation.
I have to do it myself.

spanish: Ya no quiero esconderme de ti.
english: I don't want to hide from you anymore.
